table.name: vtiger_worksummarize
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_worksummarize` ( `worksummarizeid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `worksummarizename` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `file` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `touser` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `createdtime` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `modifiedtime` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `todaycontent` text, `tommorrowcontent` text, PRIMARY KEY (`worksummarizeid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
